sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_58353a54db0f83004e5cfa131f9619c9
sys_update_xml.payload: 0) c.apiUrl = c.apiUrl + '&sysparm_fields='+c.data.columns; c.fieldCondition = c.data.columnCondition + 'LIKE'; c.fieldDisplay = c.data.columnDisplay; //default values if (!c.minLength) c.minLength = 1; c.selectRecord = function(value){ console.log(value); }; }]]>c.pi-typeahead-container { margin-bottom: 10px; position: relative; } .pi-typeahead { width: 100%; padding: 6px 35px 6px 16px; } .pi-typeahead-icon { position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 10px); right: 10px; height: 20px; float: right; opacity: 0.6; } .tt-menu { padding: 0px; width: 100%; } .tt-dataset { max-height: 200px; overflow-y: scroll; width: 100%; background-color: white; border: 1px solid #66afe9; border-radius: 4px; margin-top: 6px; } .tt-suggestion { padding: 10px 16px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 18px; } .tt-suggestion:hover { cursor: pointer; color: #fff; background-color: #66afe9; } .twitter-typeahead{ width: 100%; } .pi-search-dim { box-shadow: 0 0 0 1000px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); box-shadow: 0 0 0 100vmax rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); /* pointer-events: none; */ z-index: 999; transition-timing-function: ease-out, step-end; -webkit-transition: all 0.5s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.5s ease; -o-transition: all 0.5s ease; transition: all 0.5s ease; }sp_instancefalsepe-typeahead-searchfalsePE Typeahead Search[{"name":"table","default_value":"incident","label":"Table","type":"string"},{"hint":"The columns to obtain from the RESTFul response, ALL if the value is not specified.","name":"columns","default_value":"","label":"Columns","type":"field_list"},{"hint":"The column containing the value to compare with the one inserted in the Search field.","name":"column_condition","default_value":"number","label":"Column Condition","type":"string"},{"hint":"The column containing the value to display in the results.","name":"column_display","default_value":"number","label":"Column Display","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetfabio2017-12-11 13:12:5958353a54db0f83004e5cfa131f9619c996PE Typeahead Searchglobalglobalsp_widget_58353a54db0f83004e5cfa131f9619c9fabio2017-12-18 16:44:42
